reviewText:
Good Lord?  Not an opera, not a musical, not even a more or less decent hybrid.  A ridiculously poor libretto, mediocre music,
an absurd production!  A real waste of time and money, particularly after the recent and superb DVD's of "The Perfect American" and "Anna Nichole".  I definitely plan NOT to play it again, ever.
I appreciate Daugherty's attempt at social commentary in this opera, but it just isn't very good. I wish I had kinder things to say, but it just doesn't work.
